steps.name: I am on the Amazon page URL
I naviagate to Registry for Wedding
I click on Create Your Registry  button
I Sign In with my credentails
I can build the registry of my dreams
I can see a greeting header by our name

name: As an User
description:
I want to create weddding Registry with my credentails to Amazon application 
In order to get access of the Registry wedding application features

comments.value: #This is imperative BDD, line by line description

steps.name: I am on the Amazon page URL "https://www.amazon.com"
I should see the title and logo of the Amazon application

I enter email in input field as "tofael483@gmail.com"
I enter password in input field as "Nabeeha19"
I sould see the title of the SignIn page
